location: Hermann's Jazz Club, 753 View Street, Victoria
description: Celebrate Hermann’s Jazz Club 44th anniversary with Pablo Cardenas and an all stars line up of musicians and special vocal guests, they will bring an eclectic repertoire with Afro-Cuban Jazz classics, pieces from the all time Jazz masters repertoire played “Cuban style”, and traditional Cuban pieces to create the type of atmosphere that the occasion deserves. Former owner Stephan Nieweler will be hosting a short ceremony in memory of his father the club founder Hermann Nieweler. This will be one of those moments of the year to not miss at this legendary venue, full of rich energy and emotions, see you all then!
